description: Discover the best hotels in Mount Mulligan, Australia. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Ultra-Luxurious Queensland Outback Lodge Serenity with Mt. Mulligan Views
hotels.description: Embrace the spirit of the outback in the shadow of North Queensland's spectacular Mount Mulligan - known to Indigenous people as Ngarrabullgan - at Mt. Mulligan Lodge. Set on a working cattle station spread over 69,000 acres, this stunning boutique lodge offers laidback five-star luxury in an untamed environment. With accommodation for just 28 guests, service is highly personalised, with staff that know you (and your drink order) by name. Zip across the property in your own assigned golf buggy, which will take you to the Sunset Bar in no time to enjoy a glass of sparkling wine while the sun sinks below the horizon. Sitting on the waterâ€™s edge of a eucalyptus-fringed weir, the lodge's natural timber exterior melts into the environment, with an infinity pool the cherry on top of this indulgent outback stay.
